data.question: What is the empirical formula of the potassium salt of oxadiazole-2-thione?
Which complex showed superior cytotoxicity against MDA-MB-231 human breast cancer cells?
True or False: The ligand Kpot·H2O was found to be more potent in scavenging hydroxyl radicals at a lower concentration than both complexes.
What type of geometry does the Cu(II) complex adopt around the metal center?
Which assay was used to evaluate the cytotoxic activity of the ligand and its complexes?
True or False: Complex 2 ([Zn(en)2(pot)2]HBr·CH3OH) is diamagnetic.
What was the purpose of using DAPI fluorescent dye in the study?
data.answer: To assess the effect on cellular integrity and nuclear morphology of MDA-MB-231 cells

data.question: True or False: The wound healing assay revealed that the ligand and its complexes did not suppress the migration of MDA-MB-231 cells.
What was the result of treating MDA-MB-231 cells with Kpot·H2O and its complexes in terms of Caspase-3 activity?
data.answer: They induced a rapid increase in the expression level of Caspase-3

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of the potassium salt of oxadiazole-2-thione involved the use of CS2 and KOH.
What method was used to assess the DNA protective activity of the ligand and its complexes?
True or False: The crystal structure of Kpot·H2O was determined using X-ray diffraction.
What was the main goal of the research on the potassium salt of oxadiazole-2-thione and its Cu(II) and Zn(II) complexes?
True or False: The ligand Kpot·H2O and its complexes were found to be insoluble in aprotic polar solvents such as DMF and DMSO.
What was the impact of Kpot·H2O and its complexes on the migration ability of MDA-MB-231 cells according to the wound healing assay?
data.answer: They attenuated the migration of the cell line

data.question: True or False: The study found that the ligand and its complexes did not alter nuclear morphology in MDA-MB-231 cells.
What was the role of ethylenediamine in the synthesis of the complexes?
data.answer: It was used as a secondary ligand

data.question: True or False: The study concluded that the ligand and its complexes have no potential in inhibiting the migration of MDA-MB-231 human breast cancer cells.
What was the effect of the ligand and its complexes on the activity of Caspase-3 in MDA-MB-231 cells?
data.answer: They induced the activity of Caspase-3

data.question: True or False: The ligand Kpot·H2O was synthesized by reacting isonicotinic acid hydrazide with CS2 in a methanolic KOH solution.
